person.persName: Edwin H. Stowe (Allegheny County, Pennsylvania, attorney and judge)

body.p: Allegheny County, Pennsylvania, attorney and judge. Pennsylvania native. Married to Caroline Stowe. Admitted to the Pennsylvania bar. Attorney in Laurenceville, Pennsylvania, in 1860. Judge of the Allegheny County Court of Common Pleas from 1862 to 1902.
